definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bind, tie up, be restricted, narrow, scant, cramped (NH id.; Ar. s.ar=a bind, tie up; so Aram. [[חְרַר]], s.ar);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[חָרַר]] Ho 4:19, Pr 30:4; Imv. [[חוֹר]] Is 8:16; Inf. cstr. [[חְרוֹר]] Pr 26:8 (?); Pt. act. [[חׂרֵר]] Job 26:8; pass. [[חָרוּר]] Ho 13:12, f. [[חְרוּרָה]] 1Sa 25:29; fpl. [[חְרֻרׂת]] Ex 12:34, 2Sa 20:3; —bind or tie up, of kneading-troughs Ex 12:34 (E); fig. of a life preserved by ´[[י]], [[נֶפֶשׁ חְרוּרָה בִּחְרוֹר הַחַיִּים]] 1Sa 25:29; of preserving prophetic teaching Is 8:16; of retention of guilt Ho 13:12; of ´[[י]]'s binding waters in (a garment of) cloud Pr 30:4, Job 26:8; = shut up 2Sa 20:3; —[[חָרַר רוּחַ אׂתָהּ בִּכְנׇפֶיהָ]] Ho 4:19 (si vera l.) pregn., the wind hath wrapped her up in its wings, to carry her off; [[כִּחְרוֹר אֶבֶן]] Pr 26:8 like the tying up of a stone, but unintellig. in context (v. Toy).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[מְחׂרָרִים]] Jos 9:4 tied up (mended by tying), of old wine-skins.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[חָ֫רָה]] Is 28:20; Impf. 3 ms. [[יֵחַר]] Pr 4:12, [[יֵ֫חֶר לוֹ]] Job 20:22, [[וַ֫יֵּחֶד]] Ge 32:8 +, etc.;—be scant, cramped, in straits; of scanty bed-covering Is 28:20 (in fig.); of land too small for ([[מִן]]) its people Is 49:19 + Jos 19:47 (for [[וַיֵּחֵא]]) Dr:Expos. Jan. 1887, 59 Benn, cf. LXX; of steps = be cramped, or impeded, Pr 4:12, Job 18:7 (both in fig.); esp. impers. c. [[ל]] pers., [[וַיֵּחֶר לוֹ]] Ge 32:8 and it was narrow for him = he was in straits, distress, so Ju Jdg 2:15, 2Sa 13:2, Job 20:22, also 3 fs. [[וַתֵּ֫חֶר לְ]] Ju Jdg 10:9, 1Sa 30:6 (v. Dr).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְהֵחַר]] De 28:52, De 28:52 consec.; 1 s. [[וַהֲחֵרׂתִי]] Je 10:18, Zep 1:17; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇחַר־לוֹ]] 1Ki 8:37 = 2Ch 6:28, [[וַיׇּ֫חַד]] 2Ch 28:20; 3 mpl. [[וַיׇּחֵרוּ]] Ne 9:27; Inf. cstr. [[הָחֵר]] 2Ch 28:22, 2Ch 33:12;—make narrow for, press hard upon, cause distress to, c. [[ל]] pers., Je 10:18 (subj. ´[[י]]), Zep 1:17 (subj. id.); De 28:52, De 28:52, 1Ki 8:37 = 2Ch 6:28, Ne 9:27 (all subj. foe), 2Ch 28:20 (subj. TP); indef. subj. 2Ch 28:22 (but rd. [[כִּי אִם לְחָרָה לוֹ]], and join to v:2Ch 28:21, opp. [[לְעֶזְרָה לוֹ]], LXX Kit Buhl:Lex), 2Ch 33:12.
